forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
